input.sentences: the family poses together before their thanksgiving dinner .
the food is set up on the counter .
the children have their own table .
after eating the men gather in the living room .
the kids are tired after their large meal .
output.sentences: The family poses together at Thanksgiving.
They set the food out on the counter.
This is the table where the children ate.
The family was gathering together in the living room after eating.
The kids were tired after the large meal.
